{"item":{"at_control":"","category":"daily","description":"#洛天依九周年##洛天依##2019洛天依生日会#
天依生日快乐！
上海梅奔的线下初次见面到日本幕张展览馆看到你在异国尽情歌唱的感慨万千，时光荏苒，希望接下来的岁月你我可以一直相见[洛天依_捏捏]，可以看到你一直在舞台上快乐的歌唱[洛天依·夜航星_冲鸭][洛天依_爱你]
（图2是DIVE XR FESTIVAL演唱会的官方图，小姑娘第一次在日本演出，虽然在现场看到新的建模很激动。但是盗摄打咩，小伙伴们在观看下线演唱会时也要注意哦[洛天依·夜航星_比心][洛天依·夜航星_比心][洛天依·夜航星_比心]）","id":143045815,"is_fav":0,"pictures":[{"img_height":2976,"img_size":2887.6,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/687204533ef01db3bf6caaeb783f1108ab783d8b.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":4031},{"img_height":2731,"img_size":484.95,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/aa0f706d7f69007b4a292b761769620fbf5817ab.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":4096},{"img_height":1960,"img_size":1799.06,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/e2a6606567b67c3f6f404061dfd10d71dc2e7db1.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":3766}],"pictures_count":3,"reply":0,"role":[],"settings":{"copy_forbidden":"0"},"source":[],"title":"","upload_time":1625224593},"user":{"head_url":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/face/dbdd6a8f0f3cae786c125e805d37bb7fa479d5b9.jpg","name":"想要睡醒的小黑","uid":29226318,"vip":{"avatar_subscript":1,"due_date":1643558400000,"label":{"label_theme":"annual_vip","path":"","text":"年度大会员"},"nickname_color":"#FB7299","status":1,"theme_type":0,"type":2,"vip_pay_type":1}}}

cards.card: {"item":{"at_control":"","category":"daily","description":"#2019洛天依生日会#是湛蓝海洋！#2020洛天依生日会#是天空之境！天海相接！蓝色交织！天海一色！海面映照着天空的蓝，身披蓝色外衣的海豚跳跃出海面，在蓝天的映衬下，仿佛海豚飞上天空，海面成了蓝天的镜子！再加上星光的点缀，简直就是神仙之境！[乐正绫_爱上了]#2020洛天依生日应援##洛天依#","id":79649966,"is_fav":0,"pictures":[{"img_height":1125,"img_size":476.08,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/16d54809a42b4cbd61587dfcc793acaf0851b103.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":750}],"pictures_count":1,"reply":0,"role":[],"settings":{"copy_forbidden":"0"},"source":[],"title":"","upload_time":1593502926},"user":{"head_url":"https:\/\/i2.hdslb.com\/bfs\/face\/0c8b4b976148eb548dd8bde4b9ac9b727fb49545.jpg","name":"蓝天依lu相伴の青春","uid":362896322,"vip":{"avatar_subscript":1,"due_date":1627488000000,"label":{"label_theme":"annual_vip","path":"","text":"年度大会员"},"nickname_color":"#FB7299","status":1,"theme_type":0,"type":2,"vip_pay_type":0}}}
